posts.post_content:
I posted yesterday looking for T204 HOFers, but have decided to open it up to all players, 'commons' as well. Let me know what you have. Lower grades preferred, raw fine if cards will grade numerically. 

Scans and prices to [url]semloh00@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks, 

Ray

Monthly bump...still need you to give up your low-mid grade T204s.

I have an E90-1 Walsh as trade bait if anyone needs it. 

PM or semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

Ray
